_comment_purpose: Template for auto-creating specs/state.json if missing. Self-healing commands use this template to bootstrap state tracking.
_comment_usage: Copy this template to specs/state.json and replace placeholder values with actual data from TODO.md
_comment: Main state tracking file for project .opencode system. Auto-created from template. Links to specialized state files for archives and maintenance.

project_numbering._comment: Project numbers wrap around to 000 after 999. Ensure old projects are archived before reuse.

state_references._comment: References to specialized state files. These files are auto-created if missing.

_comment_active_projects: Populated from TODO.md tasks with status [IN PROGRESS], [PLANNED], [RESEARCHED], [BLOCKED]. Each entry should have: project_number, project_name, type, phase, status, language, created, started, last_updated, and optional fields like plan_path, research_completed, blocked, etc.
_comment_completed_projects: Populated from TODO.md tasks with status [COMPLETED]. Each entry should have: project_number, project_name, type, completed, summary.

technical_debt._comment: Technical debt tracked in task system. Update counts based on SORRY_REGISTRY.md and build status.

recent_activities.activity: Auto-created state.json from template - initialized with self-healing from TODO.md

_comment_recent_activities: Track up to 50 most recent activities. Prepend new activities to maintain chronological order (newest first).
_comment_pending_tasks: Populated from TODO.md tasks with status [NOT STARTED]. Each entry should have: project_number, title, status, language.

reviews_summary._comment: Quick reference to review status - full history in reviews/state.json

archive_summary._comment: Quick reference to archived projects - full details in archive/state.json

schema_info._comment: This schema supports backward compatibility and self-healing. New fields are additive and optional. Missing infrastructure files are auto-created from templates.
